welcome.subtitle: Let's get you started on your AI literacy journey [Indonesian]

step1.title: Discover Your Path [Indonesian]
step1.description: AI Square helps you understand and master AI literacy [Indonesian]
step1.content: We'll help you identify your strengths and areas for growth through personalized assessments and guided learning experiences. [Indonesian]
step1.assessmentDesc: Discover your current AI knowledge level [Indonesian]
step1.learningDesc: Get tailored recommendations based on your goals [Indonesian]

step2.title: Four Core Domains [Indonesian]
step2.description: Master the essential areas of AI literacy [Indonesian]
step2.content: Our comprehensive framework covers everything you need to know about working with AI effectively and responsibly. [Indonesian]

step3.title: Start Your Journey [Indonesian]
